nodes.text: Herd ship's bounty salad was a type of salad based on the traditional Ithorian covado salad. It consisted of mixed Ithorian greens garnished with starfruit and hard-boiled Ooglata eggs and served with a Meerian vinaigrette. It was served at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant for 4.7 credits and for an additional credit hoyy seeds or liwi fruit would be added.
